titleStmt.title: Die Sabbathi. 30. Sept. 1643. Whereas the companies of London have been rated by an act of Common Councell, towards the raising of monies advanced by the city, for the publique service ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
"Ordered by the Lords and Commons in Parliament that this be forthwith printed and published."
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
